entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10 except minus 4 over western sections. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 10 except minus 4 over western sections. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023
